org.jasig.cas.authentication

Class RootCasException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.jasig.cas.authentication.RootCasException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthenticationException, TicketException

    public abstract class RootCasException
extends Exception
    Generic CAS exception that sits at the top of the exception hierarchy. Provides unified logic around retrieval and configuration of exception codes that may be mapped inside an external resource bundle for internationalization of error messages.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Misagh Moayyed
    See Also:
    AuthenticationException, TicketException, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RootCasException(String code)
      Constructor that takes a code description of the error along with the exception msg generally for logging purposes.
      RootCasException(String code, String msg)
      Constructs a new exception with the code identifying the exception and the error message.
      RootCasException(String code, Throwable throwable)
      Constructs a new exception with the code identifying the exception and the original throwable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RootCasException

        public RootCasException(@NotNull
                String code)
        Constructor that takes a code description of the error along with the exception msg generally for logging purposes. These codes normally have a corresponding entries in the messages file for the internationalization of error messages.
        Parameters:
        code - the code to describe what type of exception this is.

      • RootCasException

        public RootCasException(@NotNull
                String code,
                String msg)
        Constructs a new exception with the code identifying the exception and the error message.
        Parameters:
        code - the code to describe what type of exception this is.
        msg - The error message associated with this exception for additional logging purposes.

      • RootCasException

        public RootCasException(@NotNull
                String code,
                Throwable throwable)
        Constructs a new exception with the code identifying the exception and the original throwable.
        Parameters:
        code - the code to describe what type of exception this is.
        throwable - the original exception we are chaining.

    • Method Detail

      • getCode

        public final String getCode()
        Returns:
        Returns the code. If there is a chained exception it recursively calls getCode() on the cause of the chained exception rather than the returning the code itself.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Throwable
